verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Before Your majesty I stand, Before Your throne I lift my hands, And I will lift my voice to You, Lord, I’ll give worship unto You.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Before Your majesty I stand, Before Your throne I lift my hands, And I will lift my voice to You, Lord, I’ll give worship unto You.{/lang-eng}
